quotes.quote: The secret to creativity is knowing how to hide your sources.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Don't worry about people stealing an idea. If it's original, you will have to ram it down their throats.
quotes.author: Howard Aiken

quotes.quote: I don't like composers who think. It gets in the way of their plagiarism.
quotes.author: Howard Dietz

quotes.quote: About the most originality that any writer can hope to achieve honestly is to steal with good judgment.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Art is either plagiarism or revolution.
quotes.author: Paul Gauguin
